name: Project Still
description:
Project Still is a first person, narrative driven experience about grief and mental illness. Play as David as you guide him through his day to day life around the house as he continues to live through what feels like an endless loop of self-doubt, depression and reclusiveness, simply attempting to do all he can to clean up and feel as if he can get his life back on track.

In Project Still, David must do what he can to come to terms with the tragedies and mistakes of the past in order to push forward and reach out for help, with each loop through his house feeling more claustrophobic and overwhelming until he finally decides that it's time to face his actions and take the first step towards true self improvement.

NOTE:

This game was developed in 6 weeks with a team for a  project and as such is a reasonably short experience.
